Remember Besu's bug from 2 weeks ago?

Yesterday it happened again, this time on Nethermind.

Per design — validators on SSV that picked operators with distinct client utilization remained completely immune.

The client bug occurred at Epochs ~257,907 - 257,932, in which this cluster remained at a staggering 99.03% attestation rate and 93.55% effectiveness, respectively.

Had this been a non-DVT, nethermind setup, the effectiveness would be 0, accruing penalties.

Additionally, this cluster belongs to @Meta_Pool — showcasing how even liquid staking protocols can benefit from SSV's composability.

🔗https://t.co/7wuZahw4FM
